soba_userInput: create an alternative mind map for baroque music, better organised, and completing the missing information of the model
soba_metaModelContext:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ecore:EPackage xmi:version="2.0" xmlns:xmi="http://www.omg.org/XMI" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ecore="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore" name="mindMap" nsURI="http://mindmap/0.1" nsPrefix="map">
  <eClassifiers xsi:type="ecore:EClass" name="Map">
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="name">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EString"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="description">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EString"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EReference" name="root" eType="//Concept" containment="true"/>
  </eClassifiers>
  <eClassifiers xsi:type="ecore:EClass" name="Concept">
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="name">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EString"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EReference" name="subConcepts" upperBound="-1" eType="//Concept" containment="true" eOpposite="//Concept/parent"/>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EReference" name="parent" eType="//Concept" eOpposite="//Concept/subConcepts"/>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="description">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EString"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EReference" name="relatedTo" upperBound="-1" eType="//Concept"/>
  </eClassifiers>
</ecore:EPackage>

subConcepts.name: Instrumental Music
subConcepts.description: Focuses primarily on instrumental works during the Baroque period.

subConcepts.name: Vocal Religious Music
subConcepts.description: Music created for worship and religious ceremonies.

subConcepts.name: What is?
subConcepts.description: Theatrical art form in which a story is told through music.

subConcepts.name: Libretto
subConcepts.description: Text of opera is called Libretto.

subConcepts.name: Opera
subConcepts.description: A dramatic art form combining music, singing, and performance.

subConcepts.name: Dance Suite
subConcepts.description: A set of dances, typically stylized in instrumental music.

subConcepts.name: History
subConcepts.description: An overview of the Baroque music period.

root.name: Baroque Music
root.description: Central theme of Baroque music including various aspects, styles, and historical context.

recommendationPayload.name: Baroque Music (Reorganized)
recommendationPayload.description: A comprehensive and well-organized mind map of Baroque music concepts.
